roleset.name: include

role.descr: theme, thing being included into a group

roles.note: Avoid adjectives meaning 'complicated': The plot of the novel was veryinvolved.

example.name: ergative
example.text: ...federally funded fetal-tissue research that *trace* doesn't involve transplants.

example.name: reversed ergative
example.text: Another OTC bank stock involved in a buy-out deal...

example.name: as post-nominal modifier
example.text: In a well-known detective story involving church bells...

example.name: with agent
example.text: He says Mr. Briggs told him he was being set up for a ``honey trap,'' in which [Mr. Noriega]-2 would try [*-2] to involve him in an orgy and then record the event ``with sound and video.''
